pageTitle: Prime Ministerâ€™s itinerary for Friday, October 28, 2022 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Winnipeg, Manitoba

8:45 a.m. The Prime Minister will attend the opening ceremony of the Triennial Congress of Ukrainian Canadians and deliver remarks. A brief media availability will follow.

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage for remarks
  • Media are asked to arrive no later than 8:00 a.m.
  • Media interested in participating can contact media@pmo-cpm.gc.ca for details.

1:15 p.m. The Prime Minister will meet with members of the local Iranian community.

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity
